files.title: 8.10.1. Coherence
files.summary: If a write W precedes an *overlapping* write W’ in *causality order*, then W must precede W’ in *coherence order*.

files.title: 8.10.2. Fence-SC
files.summary: *Fence-SC* order cannot contradict *causality order*. For a pair of *morally strong* *fence.sc* operations F1 and F2, if F1 precedes F2 in *causality order*, then F1 must precede F2 in *Fence-SC* order.

files.title: 8.10.4. No Thin Air
files.summary: Values may not appear “out of thin air”: an execution cannot speculatively produce a value in such a way that the speculation becomes self-satisfying through chains of instruction dependencies and inter-thread communication.
